procurement_category: Construction and Maintenance of Public Infrastructure
description: The project consists of constructing a new utility building and associated underground utility installation to support a future utility upgrade to the East Gate Operations buildings. The project includes a new raw water line, sanitary line with tie-in to existing manhole, installation of new electrical service and associated underground conduit installation to both maintain existing services and prepare for future phases of construction.
full_summary:
## Tender Notice: Stage 1 - Banff East Gate Phase 1, Banff National Park
### Solicitation Number: 5P468-23-0081/A
### Reference Number: CB-6173-71140222
### Publication Date: June 6, 2023

**Procurement Details**

* Procurement Category: CNST
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Alberta

**RFP Description**

Parks Canada invites qualified contractors to bid on Stage 1 of the Banff East Gate Phase 1 project at Banff National Park. The project involves the construction of a new utility building and associated underground utility installation to support the future upgrade of the East Gate Operations buildings.

**Important Instructions**

* Bidders are responsible for submitting their bids via fax or email as per the solicitation document.
* Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted.
* The only acceptable email address for responses to bid solicitations is [soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca).
* Bidders are required to review the bid solicitation carefully and ensure that their bid is complete and accurate.

**Bidders’ Conference**

A bidders' conference will be held on June 13, 2023, via teleconference. The conference will begin at 11:00 AM MDT and will review the scope of the requirement outlined in the bid solicitation. Bidders are encouraged to participate and ask questions.

**Bid Submission**

* Bids must be submitted in either English or French.
* Bidders are required to obtain documents from the Government Electronic Tendering Service through the Government of Canada tendering service at [www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](http://www.canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities).
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring that their bid is submitted on time and in compliance with the solicitation requirements.

**Contact Information**

Ken Lacanilao, Contracting Authority
 Phone: (587) 832-1894
 Email: [kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca](mailto:kenneth.lacanilao@pc.gc.ca)

Please note that this tender has expired on June 20, 2023. No further bids will be accepted.
